channel.title: Smart Mod not activating
channel.description:
Hi Folks,
I've installed the Smart Mod with SMM ,and it confirms it is installed with a green check mark. However, once I load up my save, I cannot use the mod. The M key doesn't work, and I don't see the arrows above what I am building.
Any ideas?

item.title: Smart Mod not activating
item.dc:creator: @ievermore Ievermore
item.description:

Hi Folks,
